name: American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings, Inc.
description: American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings, Inc. (AAM) is a leading global supplier of driveline and drivetrain systems, components, and modules for the automotive industry. Founded in 1994 and headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, AAM specializes in advanced engineering and manufacturing of products that enhance vehicle performance, fuel efficiency, and sustainability. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including major automotive OEMs (Original Equipment Manufacturers) and the commercial vehicle market. AAM's extensive product portfolio includes axle assemblies, driveshafts, and related components essential for internal combustion engine and electric vehicles. AAM is committed to innovation and has invested in advanced technologies such as electric vehicle drivetrains and lightweight materials to support the evolving automotive landscape. With a focus on quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, AAM continues to drive the future of mobility by developing systems that meet the growing demands for performance and environmental responsibility.
